Overall, not super impressed with this home in Fort Morgan, Co.
Home was not clean upon arrival: dried urine on the toilet, last tenants personal shampoo left in the shower, dirty/dusty floors, etc.
Some items mentioned in profile were not included/available: coffee, hair dryer, etc.
Projector setup in the main room was not functional and/or was not intuitive to use.
Home is pet friendly with a fenced in backyard, but dog owners beware - the backyard is largely unkept and full of stickers/thorns. Our dog unfortunately got injured by the thorns so we didn’t allow him in the yard.
A couple of the beds were not on bed frames, but rather box springs directly on the floor. Many of the blinds were broken. Siding was falling off the home. Broken outdoor furniture on deck.
Could be a great little stay with some TLC. Owner was very prompt, proactive and a pleasure to work with.

I will not stay with them again and I would not recommend it.
